sentences.english: Is it impossible to find a lovely, slender female paratrooper?
sentences.chinese: 就不能找個可人又苗條的女傘兵？

sentences.english: We watched the drop of the parachutists from the plane.
sentences.chinese: 我們看着傘兵從飛機上降落下來。

sentences.english: The parachutists dived from the plane.
The death comes two days after three Paras were killed in southern Afghanistan.
sentences.chinese: 就在兩天前，三名傘兵在阿南部被殺。

sentences.english: After accomplishing those tasks, the paratroopers had to withstand any German counterattacks.
sentences.chinese: 完成這些任務之後，傘兵還必須頂住德軍的反攻。

sentences.english: This distinctive lacing is worn on military boots by paratroopers and ceremonial guard units.
sentences.chinese: 這一共同的繫帶是由戴傘兵和禮節警衛部隊軍事靴子。

sentences.english: I served in a parachute regiment. During a nighttime exercise, I was seated next to a young officer.
Change into your pt gear, we're running Currahee.
sentences.chinese: 換上你們的傘兵制服，我們開始跑步。

sentences.english: In addition , paratroop assaults and airdrops can move ground forces and supplies .
sentences.chinese: 傘兵攻擊和空投可以地面部隊和用品。
凌晨4點鐘，傘兵們開始跳傘。

sentences.english: British paratroopers writing slogans on their Horsa gliding plane.
sentences.chinese: 寫在他們的滑翔機霍薩英國傘兵的口號。

sentences.english: US paratroopers and ceremonial guard units wear jump boots with white ladder lacing.
sentences.chinese: 美國傘兵和禮儀警衛部隊磨損跳轉靴子白色階梯花邊。

sentences.english: Of course, the paratroops were equipped with tanks!
sentences.chinese: 當然，謠言裏的德國傘兵是有坦克的。

sentences.english: And the authorities started sending us here and there against these paratroops.
sentences.chinese: 長官們開始打發我們去這裏那裏去對付這些傘兵。

sentences.english: I used to be a pilot. Now, I'm a parachutist.
sentences.chinese: 我曾經做過飛行員，今天是傘兵了。

sentences.english: His boots and purple beret identify him as commanding the Scottish Paratroops.
sentences.chinese: 他的長靴和紫色貝雷帽表明他統領着蘇格蘭傘兵部隊。

definition: amphibious/dual-talented/able to work in two different lines
lit. like a sheet of loose sand/fig. unable to cooperate (idiom)
the four great Chinese inventions: paper, printing, magnetic compass and gunpowder
abbr. of 資訊工程|资讯工程[zi1 xun4 gong1 cheng2]
